about: I design, build, and operate backend-heavy platforms that power global digital commerce. I favor event-driven architectures, serverless and managed services, and pragmatic engineering that balances speed with reliability. My work reduces operational toil, improves latency, and delivers measurable impact for users and business stakeholders.

bullets: Owned and scaled Publisher Integrations and Supply Automation platforms for onboarding and lifecycle of digital content across 300+ publishers.
Integrated 50+ gaming titles ($5M+ monthly TPV) via reusable internal APIs with controlled access, cutting cross-team integration effort by 70%.

Delivered Item Code Campaigns (100K+ redeemable codes), automated reporting pipelines, and multi-country/payment-channel flows; enhanced transaction monitoring, SKU, Product Page, and User Management modules.

Built automation for pricing, product-page creation, multi-currency conversions, scheduler-driven data sync (Lambda + SQS), Slack alerts—reducing operational workflows by 30–50% and manual effort by ~40%.
Optimized backend performance through query/index tuning, caching, and async processing; improved p95 latency by 30–40% and sped up internal workflows.
Strengthened quality via TDD, automated testing (Postman → TeamCity), SonarQube Quality Gates, targeted tech-debt reduction, RCAs, and CI/CD modernization.
Published reusable Terraform modules and configured/deployed CI runners on AWS for multiple ASGs.
Automated reconciliation in the MasterDB team to migrate services from on-prem to cloud.
Built responsive widgets for Pathfinder mobile and web apps using Flutter with GetX for state management.
Designed and implemented Profile and Support backend services with FastAPI and automated tests.
Developed REST APIs in Golang plus Vue components interacting with Google Cloud SDK.
Listed Committed Use Discounts and VM Disks to help users optimize cloud expenses.
